document.full_text: the broadening euro zone recovery means the need for economic or monetary stimulus is fading, european central bank policymaker juergen stark said on wednesday, adding there needs to be a realization that a euro zone bail out is forbidden.
document.title: need for monetary stimulus fading: ecb's stark
lines_and_colors: the broadening euro zone recovery means the need for economic or monetary stimulus is fading, european central bank policymaker juergen stark said on wednesday, adding there needs to be a realization that a euro zone bail out is forbidden.
